name: Danny Thompson
description:
'''Daniel Henry Edward Thompson''' (4 April 1939 â€“ 23 September 2025) was an English multi-instrumentalist best known as a [[double bass]]ist. During a long musical career, he played with a large variety of other musicians, particularly [[Richard Thompson (musician)|Richard Thompson]] and [[John Martyn]].

For four years, between 1964 and 1967, Thompson was a member of [[Alexis Korner's Blues Incorporated]], then led a trio that included guitarist [[John McLaughlin (musician)|John McLaughlin]], and was a founding member of the British folk-jazz band [[Pentangle (band)|Pentangle]]. Between 1987 and 2012 he also recorded six solo albums. He converted to [[Islam]] in 1990.
